When we arrive, we will take the bus up to the Machu Picchu citadel (Approx. 20 minutes).Here, we will begin our Machu Picchu tour through the archaeological complex. products.description: The Rigi Railways cogwheel train station is conveniently located across the road from the Lake Lucerne ferry pier. In general, departures are timed to coincide with the arrival of the ferry service, so if you are arriving by steamboat ferry, you will not have to wait long.Once seated on the train, get ready for the jaw-dropping views of Lake Lucerne framed by the beautiful Alps. The higher you ascend, the more spectacular the views.Take the train to the final stop: Rigi Kulm. There is a short trail to the highest point on the mountain, boasting the best panoramic views.Coming down from the top of the mountain, you have several options. We recommend hiking down the scenic trail from Rigi Kulm to Rigi Kaltbad Hotel (app. 45 minutes), then taking the cable car at Rigi Kaltbad down to Weggis. The cable car ride is included in your combination ticket. From the cable car station it's a clearly marked, 15-minute walk down to the Weggis ferry pier.You can also take the cogwheel train from Rigi Kulm to the Rigi Kaltbad stop, then walk to the Weggis-Rigi Kaltbad Aerial Cable Car. The cable car ride is included in your combination ticket. From the cable car station it's a clearly marked, 15-minute walk down to the Weggis ferry pier.Those less inclined to venture beyond the scenic viewpoints can head back to the train station at Rigi Kulm, and board the next train returning to Vitznau.
products.title: Mt. Rigi Train and Cable Car Round Trip Ticket from Vitznau / Weggis

For a surcharge, guests may use a shuttle from the airport to the hotel (available 24 hours) and a cruise ship terminal shuttle.
products.title: Hotel Belvedere

For a surcharge, guests may use a shuttle from the airport to the hotel (available on request) and a cruise ship terminal shuttle.

products.description: Located in Wildhaus-Alt St. Johann, Saentis is a 1-minute drive from Iltios Unterwasser Cable Car and 5 minutes from Wildhaus-Gampluet Cable Car. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Wildhaus-Alt St. Johann? This hotel features 250 square feet (23 square meters) of event facilities. Guests may use a train station pick-up service for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.
products.title: Saentis

products.description: When you stay at Aalankrita Resort and Convention in Medchal, you'll be 14 minutes by car from Ananda Buddha Vihara Temple.
